zh-cn: 乡村建设育才学院专修科
重庆市第十三初级中学
重庆市第二十初级中学
四川省重庆第二十中学
四川省重庆市育才中学

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国重庆市九龙坡区谢家湾正街92号
location.en: No. 92, Xiejiawan Main Street, Jiulongpo District, Chongqing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国重庆市的中学，由教育家陶行知于1939年创办，是重庆市教育委员会直属重点中学。
description.en: A secondary school in Chongqing, China, founded by educator Tao Xingzhi in 1939. It is a key secondary school directly under the Chongqing Municipal Education Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，重庆市育才中学校的创办人及首任校长。
description.en: Chinese educator, founder and first principal of Chongqing Yucai Secondary School.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾支持陶行知创办育才学校。
description.en: Chinese politician who supported Tao Xingzhi in founding Yucai School.

en: Southern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期设于重庆的派出机构，曾重视和支持育才学校。
description.en: An agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China located in Chongqing during the Second Sino-Japanese War, which valued and supported Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，作为中共中央南方局负责人，曾重视和支持育才学校，并亲自到校看望师生。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. As the head of the Southern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, he valued and supported Yucai School, and personally visited the teachers and students.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，曾应邀到育才学校演讲。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China who was invited to give a speech at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾应邀到育才学校演讲。
description.en: A political figure of the Republic of China who was invited to give a speech at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者、政治家和出版家，曾应邀到育才学校演讲。
description.en: A Chinese journalist, politician, and publisher who was invited to give a speech at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府领导人，曾于1943年参观育才学校并给予正面评价。
description.en: Leader of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China, who visited Yucai School in 1943 and gave a positive evaluation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，曾于1943年参观育才学校并给予正面评价。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China, who visited Yucai School in 1943 and gave a positive evaluation.

description.zh-cn: 中国音乐家，曾在育才学校担任音乐组组长。
description.en: Chinese musician who served as the head of the music group at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人，曾在育才学校担任文学组组长。
description.en: Chinese poet who served as the head of the literature group at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中国版画家，曾在育才学校担任绘画组组长，并设计了第一代校徽。
description.en: Chinese printmaker who served as the head of the painting group at Yucai School and designed its first emblem.

description.zh-cn: 中国舞蹈家，曾在育才学校担任舞蹈组组长。
description.en: Chinese dancer who served as the head of the dance group at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中国文学家、历史学家，曾在育才学校讲学。
description.en: Chinese writer and historian who lectured at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前总理及全国人大常委会委员长，育才学校校友。
description.en: Former Premier of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, an alumnus of Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间发生的大规模暴力冲突事件。重庆的武斗尤为激烈。
description.en: Large-scale violent conflicts that occurred during the Cultural Revolution. The struggles in Chongqing were particularly intense.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市人民政府的组成部门，主管全市教育事业和语言文字工作。
description.en: A component department of the Chongqing Municipal People's Government, responsible for the city's education and language work.

description.zh-cn: 育才学校早期负责人之一，陶行知逝世后继任校长。
description.en: One of the early leaders of Yucai School, who succeeded Tao Xingzhi as principal after his death.

description.zh-cn: 曾在1947年至1948年间主持重庆育才学校工作。
description.en: Presided over the work of Chongqing Yucai School from 1947 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 曾在育才学校担任社会科学组组长，后于1948年开始主持学校工作并担任校长。
description.en: Served as the head of the social sciences group at Yucai School, and later began to preside over the school's work and serve as principal in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市育才中学校现任校长。
description.en: The current principal of Chongqing Yucai Secondary School.

description.zh-cn: 《育才赋》的作者。
description.en: The author of the 'Yucai Fu'.

description.zh-cn: 指挥家、音乐教育家，育才学校校友，为校歌谱曲。
description.en: Conductor and music educator, an alumnus of Yucai School who composed the music for the school song.

description.zh-cn: 重庆育才中学校歌的词作者。
description.en: The lyricist of the Chongqing Yucai Secondary School song.

description.zh-cn: 教育家陶行知于1939年3月在重庆创办了育才学校。
description.en: Educator Tao Xingzhi founded Yucai School in Chongqing in March 1939.

description.zh-cn: 陶行知亲自担任育才学校首任校长。
description.en: Tao Xingzhi personally served as the first principal of Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 陶行知创办育才学校的计划得到了吴玉章的支持。
description.en: Tao Xingzhi's plan to found Yucai School received support from Wu Yuzhang.

description.zh-cn: 学校的创办得到了中共中央南方局的重视和支持。
description.en: The founding of the school received attention and support from the Southern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来曾亲自到育才学校看望全校师生，并题词支持。
description.en: Zhou Enlai personally visited Yucai School to see the teachers and students and wrote an inscription in support.

description.zh-cn: 于1943年参观育才学校，并给予了正面评价。
description.en: Visited Yucai School in 1943 and gave a positive evaluation.

description.zh-cn: 于1943年参观育才学校，并给予了正面评价。
description.en: Visited Yucai School in 1943 and gave a positive evaluation.

description.zh-cn: 在育才学校执教，担任音乐组组长。
description.en: Taught at Yucai School as the head of the Music Group.

description.zh-cn: 在育才学校执教，担任文学组组长。
description.en: Taught at Yucai School as the head of the Literature Group.

description.zh-cn: 在育才学校执教，担任绘画组组长。
description.en: Taught at Yucai School as the head of the Painting Group.

description.zh-cn: 在育才学校执教，担任舞蹈组组长。
description.en: Taught at Yucai School as the head of the Dance Group.

description.zh-cn: 曾在育才学校讲学。
description.en: Lectured at Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，学校校舍遭到严重破坏。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the school's buildings were severely damaged.

description.zh-cn: 在文革武斗期间，学校校舍遭到严重破坏，众多学生参加武斗并导致伤亡。
description.en: During the violent struggles of the Cultural Revolution, the school's buildings were severely damaged, and many students participated in the fighting, resulting in casualties.

description.zh-cn: 重庆育才中学是重庆市教委直属重点中学。
description.en: Chongqing Yucai Secondary School is a key secondary school directly under the Chongqing Municipal Education Commission.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏是育才学校的知名校友。
description.en: Li Peng is a notable alumnus of Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 陶行知逝世后，继任育才学校校长。
description.en: Succeeded Tao Xingzhi as the principal of Yucai School after his death.

position.zh-cn: 分部主任（主持学校工作）
position.en: Branch Director (in charge of school affairs)

description.zh-cn: 以分部主任身份主持重庆育才学校工作。
description.en: Presided over the work of Chongqing Yucai School as Branch Director.

description.zh-cn: 1948年8月起以分部主任身份主持学校工作，1950年9月正式担任校长。
description.en: Began presiding over school affairs as Branch Director in August 1948, and formally became Principal in September 1950.

description.zh-cn: 自2022年8月起担任重庆市育才中学校校长。
description.en: Has been serving as the principal of Chongqing Yucai Secondary School since August 2022.

description.zh-cn: 在陶行知的构思下，设计出育才学校第一代校徽。
description.en: Under the conception of Tao Xingzhi, designed the first emblem of Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 为庆祝育才建校65周年撰写了《育才赋》。
description.en: Wrote the 'Yucai Fu' to celebrate the 65th anniversary of Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 为重庆育才中学校歌谱曲。
description.en: Composed the music for the Chongqing Yucai Secondary School song.

description.zh-cn: 为重庆育才中学校歌作词。
description.en: Wrote the lyrics for the Chongqing Yucai Secondary School song.

description.zh-cn: 1939年进入育才学校音乐组学习。
description.en: Entered the music group of Yucai School to study in 1939.
